data.script:
<script>
    import {DateTimeStamp} from "@kahi-ui/framework";

    const timestamp = "2021-11-10T13:00:42-05:00";
</script>

<DateTimeStamp
    day="2-digit"
    month="long"
    weekday="long"
    year="2-digit"
    hour="2-digit"
    minute="2-digit"
    second="2-digit"
    hour_12
    {timestamp}
/>
data.title: DateTimeStamp Custom Format
